long_description: The Salomon Kevlar Replacement Laces 2 Kit has everything you need to replace the Kevlar(R) Quick-Fit(TM) lacing system on your Salomon shoes. Updated kit includes laces, smaller and lighter lace locks and lace-end caps. Kit can be used for regular or asymmetrical lacing systems. Kit also now comes with a cylinder that helps with opening and threading the replacement laces through the eyelets. For shoes with regular (non-asymmetrical) lacing systems, simply cut off the loops and lace as usual.
short_description: The Salomon Kevlar Replacement Laces 2 Kit has everything you need to replace the Kevlar(R) Quick-Fit(TM) lacing system on your Salomon shoes.
